Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.scenes

Class BasicSceneUpdater

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.observer.Observable<ClientController>
it.polimi.ingsw.view.scenes.BasicSceneUpdater
Direct Known Subclasses:
AskServerData, BasicDialog, BuyScene, DashboardScene, DialogProductionScene, EndGameScene, HomeScene, LoginScene, LorenzoDialog, MarketScene, ServerErrorController, ToastController, WaitingStartScene
public class BasicSceneUpdater extends Observable<ClientController>
Class with all the common methods between scene controllers Its an Observer so whenever client modify the model this scene wil be notified Its an observable so whenever occure this class can notify controller
